w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Putnami Web Toolkit
w:HTMLPanel.p:
PWT is a powerful GWT framework.
It's open source (published under LGPL v 3.0) and built to be lightweight and efficient. Made for ourself first, we designed it to increase our productivity, focusing on removing the useless code.

ul.li: Thanks to Twitter 's Bootstrap, your webapp are responsive and can be easily themed.
Its attractive graphic components are easy to expand and to customize.
Data binding is a cinch, building forms and dynamic tables is now simple.
Server calls are simplified and optimized. Multiplex your queries, and bind the callbacks with annotations.
Navigation uses simplified MVP. You can split and scale your webapp without even knowing your doing it.
Neither third librairies nor external JS are required, providing security and peace of mind for your achievements and your future.

w:HTMLPanel.p: Easy to get started, we offer PWT as a a serious alternative for your next webapp developments.
w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: How to Help
w:HTMLPanel.p: If you like it, and want to help us, that's wonderful! We'll be delighted if you choose to...

ul.li: Join the community on Google Group
Talk, blog and tweet about PWT. Spread the word!
Why not try and use it on your next web app?

Submit ideas to get new amazing features.

w:HTMLPanel.p: All your feedback is really precious and will be given careful consideration.
